name: tumblr eXtras - Photo Remove Blue Radar Frame
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. Removes the blue background frame from the photo area. Rounds the photo corners and provides a shadow similar to the design of the icon bar. Excellent for all styles that don't have the standard blue for a background! If you're doing your own tumblr, you might want to check out http://userstyles.org/styles/49548/tumblr-generic-theme-template The pink style is available with http://userstyles.org/styles/49676/tumblr-extras-pink-floral
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   {.post.photo_post .photo, .post.photo_post .video_thumbnail {-moz-box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #999999 !important;}.content.is_media, .mask.top, .mask.bottom {  background: none !important;}#right_column UL:first-child.right_column_section, .big_button {  background-image: none !important;}.post.photo_post .photo, .post.photo_post .video_thumbnail{border-radius: 16px !important;}}
